cite-desc: Pa'aseri la <ref> and <references> tags for citations
cite_error_ref_conflicting_dir: <ref> a yima n tari "$1" yu'urɛ sɛba n tari daaŋɔ tuulesum
cite_error_ref_numeric_key: Dagi ma'a <ref> tag; name cannot be a simple integer. Use a descriptive title
cite_error_ref_no_key: Yu'ure la <ref> tag is malformed or has a bad name
cite_error_ref_follow_conflicts: A <ref follow="…"> tagi sɛka ti ba tɔgera Mina n de bunkɛka la ka le nyaŋɛ bo e yu'urɛ a ma'a bii a yalegɛ pa'asɛ
cite_error_ref_nested_extends: Dikera paara <ref> tags more than one level deep is not allowed
cite_error_ref_no_input: Invalid <ref> tag; viisegɔ lɔgerɔ n tari yu'urɛ nari ti la tara yelesum
cite_error_group_refs_without_references: <ref> tags exist for a group named "$1", but no corresponding <references group="$1"/> tag was found
cite_error_references_group_mismatch: <ref> tag in <references> has conflicting group attribute "$1".
cite_error_references_missing_key: <ref> tag with name "$1" defined in <references> is not used in prior text.
cite_error_references_no_key: <ref> tag defined in <references> has no name attribute.
cite_error_empty_references_define: <ref> tag with name "$1" defined in <references> group "$2" has no content.
cite-tracking-category-cite-error: Pɛga n tari viisegɔ tuure duma
cite-tracking-category-cite-error-desc: Pɛga n boi buuri buuri wa tarı la tuure duma n boi a tuuma viisegɔ lɔgerɔ "yaga"
cite_warning_sectionpreview_no_text: <ref> kan ta'am te'ele bisɛ se'ere Zuo n doi la, ka boi la nananawa wa wele la yiŋa bii ka pugum ka bɔna bini kɔraa
cite-wikieditor-help-content-rereference: Viisegɔ lɔgerɔ tuuma asi'a le yɛ'ɛsa
